About Farman

Data Analyst & Storyteller

My Mission is to Make Data Speak.

Hello! I'm Farman Khan, a passionate data analyst dedicated to uncovering the narratives hidden within complex datasets. My journey into the world of data began with a deep-seated curiosity for patterns and a drive to solve meaningful problems.

I believe that raw data is like an unwritten story, full of potential but silent. My role is to be the translatorâ€”to turn that noise into a clear signal, crafting compelling visualizations and reports that are not only insightful but also accessible to any audience, from the technical expert to the boardroom executive.

My Approach

01

Start with 'Why'

Every great analysis begins not with data, but with a question. I focus on understanding the core business problem first to ensure my work is always relevant and impactful.

02

Craft the Narrative

Data cleaning, processing, and statistical analysis are the grammar of my work. I meticulously prepare the data to build a story that is both accurate and trustworthy.

03

Deliver with Clarity

The final step is visualization. I use tools like Power BI and Tableau to create interactive dashboards and clear reports that empower stakeholders to see the full picture and act with confidence.

My Toolkit

SQL Python (Pandas, NumPy) Tableau Power BI Microsoft Excel Statistical Analysis Data Visualization ETL Processes Data Storytelling

Let's Build Something Great Together

Whether you have a specific project in mind or just want to chat about the potential in your data, I'm always open to new conversations.
